title: Where in the World?
description:
A photo was posted online by a suspect. Running exiftool reveals these GPS coordinates:

GPS Latitude: 48 deg 51' 29.88" N
GPS Longitude: 2 deg 17' 40.20" E

What famous landmark is at these coordinates?

Submit as: flag{landmark_name} (lowercase, underscores for spaces)
hints: Convert DMS coordinates to decimal: Lat ≈ 48.858, Lon ≈ 2.294
Paste the decimal coordinates into Google Maps
This is one of the most visited landmarks in the world, located in Paris
